form.validation_detail: the action will be available until it is deleted
form.validation_on_detail: the action will be available until a date, quantity or both
form.date_validity_details: the action will end when it reaches a specific date
form.quantity_validity_details: the action will end when it reaches a specific number of usages
form.automatic_detail: rewards the user immediately when claimed
form.manual_detail: rewards the user only after reviewed by others
form.proof_validation_hint: Users must send a photo performing the task or a PDF file for the claim to be valid.
form.verification_code_hint: Users will have to send a unique verification code with the proof in order for the claim to be valid.

kyc.title: KYC
kyc.info: KYC means Know Your Customer and sometimes Know Your Client. KYC check is the mandatory process of identifying and verifying the identity of the client when opening an account and periodically over time. Before enabling this feature, talk with us to understand better.

restriction.title: Sorry, this page is restricted
restriction.description: This community requires some more information from its members. To have full access, please, full KYC fields in your profile.

delete.label: Delete
delete.confirmationBody: After deleting this data you won't be able to participate in some communities. Do you really want to delete your KYC data?

delete.success: Your KYC data was successfully deleted.

add.title: Add KYC data

add.canRemove: You can always remove this information from your profile if you decide to do so.
